abstract: The Busch family that has run Anheuser-Busch for more than a cenutry certainly is colorful. But that doesn’t give the family license to flat-out reject a takeover offer that would benefit the company’s long-suffering shareholders.
lead_paragraph: The Busch family that has run Anheuser-Busch for more than a cenutry certainly is colorful. But that doesn’t give the family license to flat-out reject a takeover offer that would benefit the company’s long-suffering shareholders.
